title: KRaCR Lab
description: At the KRaCR Lab affiliated with the CSE department and part of the Infosys Centre for Artificial Intelligence, we investigate techniques to incorporate these features into the machine and improve its decision making. We work on all aspects of the Semantic Web and Knowledge Graphs, including ontology modelling, knowledge graphs, ontology reasoning, and their applications to different domains such as healthcare, air pollution, and robotics.
subtitle: Knowledgeable Computing and Reasoning Lab
